Calculate  $\sum_{i=1}^{100}(i^3 + 4i^2)$

1. Generate vector $i$ 

    ```{r}
    i <- seq(from = 1, to = 100, by = 1)
    ```
  
2. Create function $f(i) = i^3 + 4i^2$

    ```{r}
    f <- function(i) {
      i^3+4*i^2
    }
    ```
  
3. Calculate $\sum f(i)$

    ```{r}
    sum(f(i))
    ```
